A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a bit of divisive movie. Where The Force Awakens opted to borrow some elements from A New Hope\, TLJ borrows very few elements from other Star Wars films. It's very different. There's a clear divide among the fanbase as to what they want going forward\, but I personally enjoyed the movie very much. I'm interested to see the final installment of this trilogy\, and where it takes our titular hero\, and villain\, from here.
